Steve Ballmer , Microsoft chief executive. "Cloud computing, and specifically Windows Azure, enables banks to move from a capital intensive cost model to one which is based on the consumption of technology," says Steve Ballmer . No longer will banks need to over-order computing resources because the scale of the Azure platform allows high volume workloads such as end-of-day processing to be consumed on demand. and ended up in the Pro Bowl, a year-and-a-half after finishing a federal prison term for running a dogfighting ring. "It's unbelievable," Michael Vick , 30, said on the NFL Network set. I have to give all glory to God. I thank my coaches and my teammates, they put me in this position. They got me better as an NFL player, as a quarterback and took advantage of my talents. I just can't say that enough. I hate to continue to say that and sound redundant, but it's the truth.
